title: News: Parklife Festival Line-Up Announced
content:
This June, Parklife Festival returns for its third year at Platts Field Park, Manchester, featuring an absolutely stellar lineup featuring acts such as Twin Shadow, Gold Panda, Mount Kimbie, Tom Vek, Ghost Poet, Azealia Banks and (the shining diamond at the top of the line-up) The Flaming Lips, whose festival appearances we have gushed over before and whose inclusion turns the festival’s line-up from a fantastic one to an unmissable one.

The full line-up can be read below, and tickets are on sale here starting from £64.50.

Saturday

THE FLAMING LIPS / NOAH & THE WHALE / NERO / PENDULUM (DJ) / CRYSTAL CASTLES / TOM VEK / SPECTOR / FRIENDS / DJANGO DJANGO / KELIS / THE CUBAN BROTHERS / DJ YODA / KRYSKO & GREG LORD / CHIC FEAT. NILE RODGERS / ZANE LOWE / SUB FOCUS (DJ) / JAGUAR SKILLS / TEMPA T / DJ HYPE / GOLDIE / 16 BIT / NORTH BASE / DAMIAN LAZARUS / ART DEPARTMENT / MACEO PLEX / CLIVE HENRY / DANNY DAZE / SUBB-AN / PHENOMANAL HANDCLAP BAND / STAY + / TO KILL A KING / NOW WAVE DJS / WILL TRAMP! / TOTALLY ENORMOUS EXTINCT DINOSAURS / REDLIGHT / PEARSON SOUND / ARAABMUZIK / BEN UFO / THUNDERCAT / DAEDELUS / SPACE DIMENSION CONTROLLER / B TRAITS / DAMU / FAKE BLOOD / D/R/U/G/S / JAMES ZABIELA / TENSNAKE / JUSTIN ROBINSON / SCREEN DEATH / JAMES RAND / SIMIAN MOBILE DISCO / HEIDI / MARCO EFFIE & JAMES MILE / ROMAN ALFERI & LUCA BEAR / ELFESSE & JOZEF K / US & THEM / PETE ZOBRA

Sunday

DIZZEE RASCAL / JUSTICE (LIVE) / LABRINTH / ANNIE MAC / AZEALIA BANKS / THE RAPTURE / EROL ALKAN / MOUNT KIMBIE / DELILAH (LIVE) / MADEON / MURKAGE / MISTY JAM / JUICY DJS / DE LA SOUL / MADEON / BUSY P / WILL TRAMP! / JACQUES LU CONT / GOLD PANDA / GHOST POET / TWIN SHADOW / OTHER LIVES / THE FIELD / JESSIE WARE / NOW WAVE DJS / FACTORY FLOOR / HIGH CONTRAST / NETSKY / LONDON ELEKTRICITY / DANNY BYRD / LOADSTAR / LOGISTICS / NU:TONE / SPY / JESSIE ALAN / FRED V & GRAFFIX / DYNAMITE MC / MAYA JANE-COLES / CLAUDE VON STROKE / JULIO BASHMORE / TOD EDWARDS / JOY ORBISON / MIGUEL CAMPBELL / EATS EVERYTHING / KRYSKO / FRESH (LIVE) / BURAKA SOM SISTEMA / CASPA / SHY FX / ARTWORK / DAVID RODIGAN / DAM FUNK & MASTER BLAZTER / DOT ROTTEN / TODDLA T / ONEMAN / RICH REASON / SOUL CLAP / WOLF & LAMB / FLOATING POINTS / FEEL MY BICEP / COM TRUISE / DROP THE MUSTARD DJS / ZUTEKH DJS
